title: EUW Server /Game crashing and dcing all lame long
body: I lost a ranked game and crashed out of 4 games total today because of constantly disconnecting out of the games. Riot can you check the  EUW server pls

replies.body: - german board, so speak german pls.
I played 2 games todas and in both games i crashed out man wtf is that i play ranked and loose points cause of that ty riot man ty!!!
